Hello, everybody.

Felipe from SÃƒÂ£o Paulo, Brazil, here! I'm still playing around with the demo and, although I was doing fairly well in the previous version, I'm completely lost in the new one (v1.0.0.813).

Regards,

Hello hello!

That certainly sounds distressing. Are you playing with mods? Which ones? And what happens when you do try and save your designs?

Everyone, welcome Felipe! If you ever need to be reminded of where the cookies are, just ask me.

Have you looked in your KSP directory? Any saved craft files are moved there under saves Ã¢â€ â€™ [save game name] Ã¢â€ â€™ ships Ã¢â€ â€™ VAB/SPH

I've never used the demonstration, so I don't know if that could be related, but I suspect it might be.
PoÃƒÂªt & Welcome ; ) take your time and you will manage it Felipe ; ) how hard could it be anyway ; )

Hi, everyone! And thanks for the warm welcome!

No mods, only the good and plain Demo.

All the save files are there, but I can't load them on the game. Nothing happen when I click on the folder icon on VAB. Maybe is a bug in the demo?

Cheers,

Felipe

Ayyy! Welcome!

Felipe also happens to be the developer's name!
